q: How often should I inspect my flood barriers?
a: Visual inspection every six months and after each deployment. Check gasket compression, anchor torque, and track cleanliness. Annual professional inspection keeps certification active. See gasket replacement.

q: What cleaning products are safe for aluminum barriers?
a: Use pH-neutral detergent and soft cloth. Avoid chlorine or acidic cleaners—they accelerate corrosion. Rinse with fresh water after each storm, especially in coastal zones like Naples.

q: Do I need to lubricate components?
a: Apply silicone-based spray to compression bolts and clamps twice per year. Never use petroleum grease on EPDM gaskets; it causes swelling.

q: How do I store panels off-season?
a: Stack vertically with foam spacers in a dry, shaded area. Avoid concrete contact to prevent galvanic staining. Follow panel storage tips for full details.
